title: Other symptomatic late syphilis
block: Infections with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission
inclusion: diseases generally recognized as communicable or transmissible
Gumma (syphilitic) any sites, except those classified to A52.0-A52.3
Late or tertiary syphilis any sites, except those classified to A52.0-A52.3
Late syphilitic: female pelvic inflammatory disease
exclusion: carrier or suspected carrier of infectious disease
certain localized infections - see body system-related chapters
infectious and parasitic diseases complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium [except obstetrical tetanus]

infectious and parasitic diseases specific to the perinatal period [except tetanus neonatorum, whooping cough, congenital syphilis, perinatal gonococcal infection and perinatal human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease]
influenza and other acute respiratory infections
